row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_ANALYTICS.PRV.JOB.GET_SHARED_DASHBOARDS
row.description: Query the analytics backend with groovy to get list of shared dashboards for user

row.process: :ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_ANALYTICS.PRV.STORE.GROOVY", "*", C :SET &ANALYTICS_BACKEND_URL# = GET_VAR(PCK.AUTOMIC_ANALYTICS.PUB.SETTINGS,ANALYTICS_BACKEND_URL,1) :SET &ANALYTICS_BACKEND_API_KEY# = GET_VAR(PCK.AUTOMIC_ANALYTICS.PUB.SETTINGS,ANALYTICS_BACKEND_API_KEY,1) :SET &ANALYTICS_BACKEND_NO_SSL_CHK# = GET_VAR(PCK.AUTOMIC_ANALYTICS.PUB.SETTINGS,ANALYTICS_BACKEND_IGNORE_SSL,1) :SET &R_USER# = "&$USER#/&$DEPARTMENT#" :SET &COMMAND# = "java -jar analytics-groovy-runner.jar getPublicDashboards.groovy -s ""&ANALYTICS_BACKEND_URL#"" -c &$CLIENT# -u ""&R_USER#"" -a ""&ANALYTICS_BACKEND_API_KEY#""" :IF &ANALYTICS_BACKEND_NO_SSL_CHK# = "Yes" : SET &COMMAND# = "&COMMAND# -ignoreSslIssues" :ENDIF :P &COMMAND# :P &$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT# :SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS" cd /d &$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT# &COMMAND# @set retcode=%errorlevel% @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode :CASE "UNIX" cd "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#" &COMMAND# :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX :OTHER :ENDSWITCH
